extends Object
implements Pauseable

        public void unregisterDownloadStatusListener(OnFileDownloadStatusListener onFileDownloadStatusListener)

        参数:

        从以下版本开始:
        0.2.0

      • detect

        @Deprecated
public void detect(String url,
                     OnDetectUrlFileListener onDetectUrlFileListener,
                     DownloadConfiguration downloadConfiguration)
        已过时。 this method can not detect the url file which bigger than 2G, use detect(String, OnDetectBigUrlFileListener, DownloadConfiguration)instead
        detect a url file
        参数:
        url - file url
        onDetectUrlFileListener - OnDetectUrlFileListener impl
        downloadConfiguration - download configuration

      • detect

        public void detect(String url,
          OnDetectBigUrlFileListener onDetectBigUrlFileListener,
          DownloadConfiguration downloadConfiguration)
        detect a big url file, which means can detect the url file bigger than 2G
        参数:
        url - file url
        onDetectBigUrlFileListener - OnDetectBigUrlFileListener impl
        downloadConfiguration - download configuration

      • createAndStart

        public void createAndStart(String url,
                  String saveDir,
                  String fileName,
                  DownloadConfiguration downloadConfiguration)
        create a new download after detected a url file by using detect(String, OnDetectBigUrlFileListener, DownloadConfiguration)
        if the caller cares for the download status, please register an listener before by using
        registerDownloadStatusListener(OnFileDownloadStatusListener, DownloadStatusConfiguration)
        参数:
        url - file url
        saveDir - saveDir
        fileName - saveFileName
        downloadConfiguration - download configuration

      • start

        public void start(String url,
         DownloadConfiguration downloadConfiguration)
        start/continue a download
        if the caller cares for the download status, please register an listener before by using
        registerDownloadStatusListener(OnFileDownloadStatusListener, DownloadStatusConfiguration)
        参数:
        url - file url
        downloadConfiguration - download configuration

      • start

        public void start(List<String> urls,
         DownloadConfiguration downloadConfiguration)
        start/continue multi downloads
        if the caller cares for the download status, please register an listener before by using
        registerDownloadStatusListener(OnFileDownloadStatusListener, DownloadStatusConfiguration)
        参数:
        urls - file urls
        downloadConfiguration - download configuration

      • isDownloading

        public boolean isDownloading(String url)
        从接口复制的说明: Pauseable
        whether is downloading
        指定者:
        isDownloading 在接口中 Pauseable
        参数:
        url - file url
        返回:
        true means the download task of the url is running

        指定者:
        pause 在接口中 Pauseable
        参数:
        url - file url
